name: Tiny Google Analytics
author: HellMind

sections.description:
Inserts tracking code only, view your stats in your Google account.

Features

  • Drop-dead simple and easy to use
  • Uses latest version of Google Analytics Tracking Code
  • Inserts your tracking code on all theme pages
  • Ultra Lightweight, and born of simplicity, no frills

Donations

I created this plugin with love for the WP community. To show support, consider Links, tweets and likes. Thanks! ðŸ™‚
sections.installation:
1. Unzip, Upload, activate
  2. Visit the “Tiny Google Analytics” options page, enter your Google Analaytics Property ID, and done.

For more information, visit the Tiny Goolgle Analytics Plugin Homepage.
sections.faq: To ask a question, visit the Tiny Google Analytics Plugin Homepage or contact me.

short_description: Tiny Google Analytics adds Google Analytics Tracking Code using an optimzed code, useful for MultiSite.(Low resource usage).

upgrade_notice: To upgrade, remove old version and replace with new version. Nothing else needs done.
